meanings.def: easily able or likely to explode
likely to cause violence or strong feelings of anger or hate
examples: one of the most explosive issues of our time
The political situation is potentially explosive.

meanings.def: often having sudden violent or angry feelings

examples: the explosive growth of the export market
There was an explosive crash and then everything fell silent.

meanings.def: a substance that is able or likely to cause an explosion
examples: The bomb was packed with several pounds of high explosive.
Explosives were found near the scene.
They planted explosives in the tunnel.
